SEARCH
Package com.se.goBears.service

Class RoomReservationService

java.lang.Object
com.se.goBears.service.RoomReservationService
@Service public class RoomReservationService extends Object
This service class handles the request for the room reservations.

    • roomReservation

      public Room roomReservation(Long roomId, Reservations reservations) throws Exception
      This method given a room id and reservation check if the reservation date is valid and add a new reservation for the room.
      Parameters:
      roomId - is the id of the room to be reserved.
      reservations - is the reservation object.
      Returns:
      room object with newly added reservation.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the reservation dates are already occupied.

      This method parses the string date and returns a date.
      Parameters:
      a - the string value for date to be parsed.
      Returns:
      a parsed date value.

    • isDateInBetweenIncludingEndPoints

      public static boolean isDateInBetweenIncludingEndPoints(Date min, Date max, Date date)
      This method returns true if the given date exists between two other given dates.
      Parameters:
      min - is the start date.
      max - is the end date.
      date - is the date to be checked if it is between two dates.
      Returns:
      True if date exists between min and max dates else False.

    • getAllRoomReservation
